website_summaries.verdict: The Glowforge is pricey, but with good reason. It auto focuses to the width of a human hair, auto-detects your medium, and can engrave anything from leather to chocolate.
pros: Precise to a thousandth of an inch
Carves up to 1/2" deep and more than 1,300 lines per inch
Prints on wood, leather, paper, fabric, acrylic, glass, metal, and chocolate
Sets its own power, speed, and other settings automatically
Simply add your paper drawing, PDF, or photo and print
Run machine wirelessly from Mac, PC, phone, or tablet
CDRH Class 1 meets CE, FDA, and FCC standards
cons: Some metals must be sprayed with product before engraving

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Received the glowforge without the accessories or proof grade materials packages. The only way to resolve the issue is returning and reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Karpinski

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine! It was very easy to set up and use. I have zero experience with laser cutters but this was very user friendly. I have cut/engraved wood, acrylic, and leather. I’ve even engraved cardstock and a LEAF! I’ve never sold crafts before but since owning a Glowforge I’ve sold several already.
customer_reviews.author: alisa sudlow

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Muse hobby laser from Full Spectrum
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, but does fail, and trying to get it replaced by the non existant support is really difficult. Go checkout full spectrum muse hobby laser instead. Full Spectrum is always available for support and answering any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware....PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: I have a $4000 piece of electronics . This is a replacement of the first. The machine is operated from the cloud and Hasn’t worked since a mandatory firmware update by the company. The company stopped on line support, and customer support and their telephone number is voicemail. The. Machine is under warranty and a extended warranty. I love the machine when it was working. I found a repair company who has the same problem with the Glowforge
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Gow

customer_reviews.title: Best Laser Engraver/cutter on the market today
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the Glowforge Plus for about a month now and absolutely love it! There's nothing that my mind can imagine that this little workhorse can't do. Sleep is over rated when you own a Glowforge Laser Engraver-Cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Doornbos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The Glowforge Plus is exactly what my headline states....amazing. Out of the box and up and running immediately. The laser was packed very well, and in spite of the box bottom having been cut open sometime during shipping, it was in perfect condition. Easy setup, easy to understand directions to get you started engraving or cutting your project immediately. Great sample materials packed inside and a wealth of information and help available on the Glowforge site. That, plus free, two day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: HMD

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for a non-techy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Glowforge in July 2019 and I love it! It arrived quickly with no damage and was very easy to setup. It was slow going for . at first because I was trying to use a free software to design with and I did not find it to be user friendly. I purchased Silouette business edition and now designing is so much easier! I am stamazed at the very intricate detail the Glowforge can engrave and cut. I only rated 4 stars because Customer service contact needs to be upgraded. For a machine at this price, we should be able to get help by telephone, not just email.
customer_reviews.author: sherry shine

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my jewelry business because I wanted to design my own pieces, the machine itself is great, I wish you could cut/engrave from other programs besides the Glowforge app website, other than that it’s pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Super duper
customer_reviews.text: Its super easy to use and easy to set up. A tip for people. Take care of your box when opening. Id you need to send it back for any reason you need the box and all its contents. If you lose anything it cost like $200+ to get it replaced. I didnt know this till after I destroyed my box.
customer_reviews.author: Amcustbhbgb

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this laser. Set up instructions were super clear and I had good cuts instantly. Very happy with this purchase AND with the customer service. I have been using files I create in my Silhouette Design software and the Glowforge is easy to work with those SVG files. A couple more things I really like: the camera that scans your material and allows you to use your scrap wood efficiently and the timer during the print job so you know how long to expect the process to take.
customer_reviews.author: Camron Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Up and running in minutes
customer_reviews.text: My brother has a ~$500 laser cutter from China. It does the job well enough but requires quite a bit of fiddling with settings, leveling of the bed, trial and error aligning things, etc. The glowforge has been a breeze to set up and use from the moment I took it out of the box. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase for any Maker!
customer_reviews.text: “I am extremely happy with my Glowforge. It is extremely easy to use all the way around. I can turn out small projects for friends and duplicates for retail all the same in no time!” Here are my pros and cons: Pros: -Supper easy to use for simple ideas and designs. -Relatively no maintenance -Fast -Extremely pleasing to watch -Very little assembly required -Cost Cons: -Camera accuracy. While it’s a really cool way to place my art on the material I want to print on, I wish there where a way to tell the machine at what x and y axis to print at.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Amacher

customer_reviews.title: Great product with amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this Glowforge for some time as I watched it develop and saw it at Maker's Faire. I knew right away I wanted it when it became more readily available. I was surprised and excited to find it on Amazon. Quick shipping, set it up and had an issue linking. Contacted support and they were FAST! I was cutting within hours! I have made a wedding, Birthday and gifts for my entire staff. I have a whole list of projects I plan to create for the holidays. The sky is the limit when it comes to materials and designs. Every crafter needs this!
customer_reviews.author: D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laser cutters of its size
customer_reviews.text: Have had the Glowforge for a few weeks now and it has worked great. Having worked extensively with 3D printers and CNC machines, the speed and easy of use that the camera driven alignment offers is second to none. I am significantly more efficient with my wood use since I don't have to rely on XY positions with this machine. I had one slight issue with calibration after about 10 hours of use. A quick chat with the online service tech and a clean of the main camera and i was back up and running moments later. A great product so far!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly and top quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is outstanding, well thought out design, super easy to use, absolute amazing quality overall. The ability to nest your objects on your material using the live camera is excellent. The software is simple and user friendly! If I had to complain about something it would be that I really like using their proof grade materials they just need more selection of the materials! Even when I use things that are not proffgrade it is simple to set, experiment and fine tune then save that setting! Worth every dollar currently using it mainly for trophy applications but working on all types of crafts for Christmas as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Pittman

customer_reviews.title: we love ours
customer_reviews.text: we ordered ours from amazon, it didn't work right out of the box, but Glowforge sent us a new one with in a week. its a lot of fun, and we have made decent money with it, but to be honest most people have been just as happy with a basic model.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Hobbyists
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Wish I would have purchased the professional version. Hoping that they make an upgrade kit someday.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my GlowForge. It's very exciting to make things and even more exciting thinking of the possibilities for new items. Your imagination is really open to so many possibilities. Using the Proofgrade materials that came with the unit is so easy and the output is perfect. I have tried a few non Proofgrade materials, ceramic tile is really cool and pretty easy. I am planning on buying Proofgrade materials simply for the ease, and they are not overpriced at all. It would be nice if I could also buy them from Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Glowforge Laser Printer is MAGIC✨
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Glowforge! I made everything in the pics within the first month of opening the box and had NO previous laser experience. It was quick and easy to learn. I was scared to spend the money but now I’m SO glad I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Berry

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was between a CNC and the GLowforge and I am so glad that I went with the Glowforge. The GlowForge was easy to setup and start using right away. The walkthrough had me making cool things the same day I unpacked. The starter kit of materials let me play and the learning curve was very easy. The online community and customer support have been fantastic. I have already started working through my Christmas list of customized gifts for the family.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: A revolution in my marketing and other art.
customer_reviews.text: I practice law, do woodwork, run a non-profit, and a consulting service. In the first few days of owning my glow forge pluss I have made boxes, custom boxes of my own design, marketing materials for our consulting firm, poker chips for a alternative dispute session in my law office, and more. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Booth

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far this machine has been the best. I’ve used it 3 times with no problem! I love it! Fast and extremely easy to used!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine has changed our life. So far so good. We have never had so much fun. I wish we hadn’t waited so long to get it.
customer_reviews.author: ronda treis

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Glowforge Plus!
customer_reviews.text: The Glowforge is fantastic! It’s so exciting to see your creations become physical objects that you can use or even wear. Make sure you have access to vent it out a window. And even though I knew the dimensions before purchasing it still was somewhat surprising how large it really is. I’m glad it is that size for making signs etc. Overall, it’s a lot of fun creating, experimenting and making things with the Glowforge!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Service
customer_reviews.text: After 4 days, I have been contacted by Glowforge Service and the matter is now being attended to.
customer_reviews.author: Ashdon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Had the Glowforge for almost a month and still figuring out everything it can do! It does seem to have a glitch that might be in the software that etches a line through some engravings... haven’t figure out to keep it from doing that yet. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue V Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Trying to make it work
customer_reviews.text: The glowforge arrived on time and well packaged. So far it is not working, because the camera is not working. We are trying to figure out how to make it work and seeking assistance from tech support.
customer_reviews.author: H&S Innovations

customer_reviews.title: Glowforge Plus gets an A+
customer_reviews.text: After having and using my Glowforge Plus for 3 months, I love it! It was easy to set up and begin using right away. I use Silhouette Business Edition software to design my svg files and send to the Glowforge app. I have only used it for making small items such as acrylic and wooden monograms pendants and earrings. It is simple to operate and I have learned a great deal from the community forum. There are so many creative possibilities with the Glowforge Plus!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Piece of Machinery
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about this machine. This is my first foray into 3D printing/laser engraving, and I am totally sold on the concept. Every project is so much fun to make!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Tonelektro

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Tool
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my Glowforge. I've been using it to create art pieces and it has definitely delivered. It is super easy to set up and the online patterns are great for newbies. They also offered great support and service when I had a question! I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking at purchasing a laser cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! Once you start using this, you can never stop!! It is so easy to make my visions come to life!! I have made so many things just in the simple month I have had it. My walls and tables are covered in art
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just amazing. I just got done using it to make laser cut wedding invitations which are sure to impress our guests. I will say I did have an issue with the machine when I first got it but the Glowforge support staff replaced my unit quickly and had me running again. Great product and great company.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: YEEEESSSSS!  Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting with myself on whether to make a commitment to this particular machine. I've had it a week and I am still blown away every day with it's capabilities! The online community Forum is stellar. This is now my favorite gadget...ever!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Appeal

customer_reviews.title: The Glowforge is so awesome and I mean it.  WOW
customer_reviews.text: The Glowforge is the perfect home machine it’ll do anything you can imagine or want to do the first day I made three projects it’s extremely user-friendly and I recommend it to anybody that is looking to purchase a laser engraver cutter
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I received the GlowForge Plus for Christmas and it has been a lot of fun to play with. Very easy to set up and easy to set up files if you have some background in working with SVG files or Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop. Highly recommend for any crafter who wants to take their skills to another level!
customer_reviews.author: amazon_guru

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Glowforge Plus and so far I am extremely pleased with it. I had gone back and forth over purchasing it for over a year, and am so happy to have finally made the decision to become an owner. I love the ease with which I can create beautiful things. I do mainly wood crafts and I find the plus is very capable of anything I would need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the machine easy to use, the customer service is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Roggen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for work. My wife has tried to take it over for crafting. In any case, it has exceeded our expectations. It works well and the community users is very helpful in answering questions. Take the plunge. Buy a laser. People will be in awe and have a healthy fear. You will have an amazing tool for thousands of projects.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Densmore

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed the machine so far and have found it easy to startup. Would like the purchase materials to be a better price but overall am very satisfied with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: artPOP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quick to get started
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and getting started was easy. It was a huge help that I already had some experience making vector graphics files. Two weeks in and I've engraved stainless steel bracelets, made a few wood signs and even made some earrings out of acrylic - having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: vonniez

customer_reviews.title: Laser doesn't work at all. From notes online  looks like mine isn't the only one
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Makes loud noises. Laser inoperable. 30 minutes to unpack and get working... NO... 6 hours wasted so far and nothing to show for it. Should have just built my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my glowforge. Theres just not enough time in the day to be able to do everything I want to do with it. Customer service is fantastic, very efficient and friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use creative tool
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve only used proofgrade materials thus far and haven’t ventured into the realm of determining my own settings for other materials. But the results have been beautiful. I cant wait to start using it with other materials!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin DeGraffenreid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fast customer service
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how addictive this would be we use ours every day. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Hi It is just like I expected I love it with all I can do I am still learning but I have made a few small things more to come One happy Forger Darlene
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun and Super Useful for My Small Business
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a blast with it so far and we've really redone how we do displays and signage at work already. We're doing so much with it there's already discussion about buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zorowitz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: super fun and easy.. great quality.. it’s really a pleasure to use
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great laser machine! Arrived as promised and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for an elementary maker space. It is amazing. The applications are endless! The user interface is easy to master and the Glowforge itself is very simple to learn. I’m excited about all of our future possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: HSH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful investment!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing machine! The possibilities are seriously endless! Glowforge has an amazing customer service team and a great forum for users.
customer_reviews.author: ToriS

product_meta.title: Glowforge Plus 3D Laser Printer – The Fast, Easy, and Powerful Tool for Wood, Leather, Craft, Paper, Fabric, and DIY. The Ultimate Hobby Laser Cutting & Engraving Machine
product_meta.description:
Make magical things at the push of a button.

What if you could sketch a design, then turn it into something real you could actually use? What if you could print things you wanted, needed, or just dreamed up on your desk, instead of relying on factories half a world away?

Meet Glowforge. It uses a beam of light the width of a human hair to cut, engrave, and shape designs from a variety of materials.

There’s a lot you can do with that kind of power: it’s having the perfect gift when you need one. A way to furnish your space. A personal boutique. A sandbox for your inventions. A launchpad for your business. And that's just the start.

Three steps to a finished product.

Step 1: Make Your Design
Whether you craft for fun or you’re an experienced designer, it’s easy to bring your ideas to life. Use dozens of different design software packages – everything from high-end CAD software to PowerPoint. It takes PDF, SVG, JPEG and other common file formats. Designing can also be as simple as drawing with a pen – Glowforge has onboard cameras that will scan your drawing and transform it into a digital file you can print, once or a hundred times. 

Step 2: Pick Your Materials
You can use all kinds of materials with Glowforge – things like wood or leather, fabric, cardboard, acrylic, and even chocolate. In fact, you can print on hundreds of materials – a river rock, secondhand lumber, your iPhone. It’s up to you, but to make things easy, you can use our line of Proofgrade materials. They’re finished and come encoded with automatic settings for perfect printing every time. 

Step 3: Watch the Magic Happen
Hit print and watch your Glowforge go. It works on a PC, it works on a Mac, and we have apps for iPad and iPhone – so you can create with just your fingertip. See your finished product in minutes. 
Human accessible laser power: less than 0.1 mW CDRH/IEC Class 1 laser product
feature_bullets: YOUR IDEA, IN YOUR HANDS, IN MINUTES – Push the button and the powerful 40 watt laser creates meaningful gifts for your friends, unique products to sell, or something personalized just for you.
SIMPLY AUTOMATIC– Autofocus. Material detection. Automatic print settings. Just pick your drawing, PDF, or photo, add one of dozens of household materials, and click print.
FREE SOFTWARE & 30 MINUTE SETUP– There's nothing to install - the free app works with your PC, Mac, phone, or tablet.

LASER PRECISION with DOZENS OF MATERIALS – Precise to the width of a human hair. Carve up to 1/2" deep, 11" tall, and 19.5" wide, at over 1,300 lines per inch. Engrave or print beautiful and useful products from wood, leather, paper, fabric, acrylic, glass, metal, cardboard... even chocolate!
SAFE FOR HOME AND SCHOOL – The only CDRH Class 1 laser cutter and engraver. Independently safety tested to UL, CE, FDA, and FCC standards for peace of mind.
